issue.title: [C++] Revisit function categories in the context of the query engine
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15832](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15832). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[This PR thread on whether a cumulative sum function should be treated as a Scalar or Vector function](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12460#issuecomment-1057521694), brought up an interesting discussion on the classes of functions currently available in Arrow.
